metadata.Title: CVE-2010-4209 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the Flash component infrastructure in YUI 2.8.0 through 2.8.1, as used in Bugzilla 3.7.1 through 3.7.3 and 4.1, allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via vectors related to swfstore/swfstore.swf.

criterions.comment: loggerhead package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
